channel.title: Drop Party
channel.description: Could anyone send me a link to a tutorial on how to make a 317 PI drop party, I don't want a command just to drop things spread out across my character, I'm trying to make it actually summon the dancing knights and drop the balloons etc. I'm even thinking of adding my own interface so they can choose the items they would like to be dropped.

item.title: Drop Party
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

Could anyone send me a link to a tutorial on how to make a 317 PI drop party,
I don’t want a command just to drop things spread out across my character, I’m trying to make it actually summon the dancing knights
and drop the balloons etc.
I’m even thinking of adding my own interface so they can choose the items they would like to be dropped.

Read full topic
